data.message: Hi Facebook, my husbands grandfather died a few years ago and we are still trying to remove his account. What needs to be done to do so? It's a constant reminder of his passing and very emotional for some family members. Thanks!

replies.message: Hi Brianna. You will find information on reporting a deceased person or an account that needs to be memorialized in our Help Center at: http://on.fb.me/1s4NbSl  -Ryan
Why won't facebook let me change my cover photo. When I hover over it, the option to change it is no longer there.
its over there but the place has been changed into left side of your cover photo. you can see the camera sign over there and change your cover picture which has been changed recently ..
